content: ✈️ NYC feels like a new canvas after Japan. Excited but also a bit lost on blending these worlds. Time to plan that cultural exchange event! #NYC #JapanInspired
raw_content: ✈️ Back in NYC after an unforgettable journey in Japan. The city feels different now, almost like I'm seeing it with new eyes. Excited for what's next, but also a bit lost on how to blend these two worlds. Time to start planning that cultural exchange event! #NYC #JapanInspired
